title: LOL UPDATED CLIENT
body: Hi everyone and @Riot, I have previously updated the client to the new one when it first came out however decided i liked the old client better so i switched back and deleted the new one from my computer. Until the practice tool came out so i tried switching back to the new client and it just doesn't let me, I click the update client now thing, then it shows "Launch" straight away, i click Launch and then the client just never appears, I have tried Uninstalling and reinstalling League but nothing seems to help getting the new client, any ideas anyone?? someone please help @Riot.
